IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO GUIDE AND EMPOWER INDIVIDUALS TO MAKE POSITIVE CHOICES IN THEIR OWN LIVES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO GUIDE AND EMPOWER INDIVIDUALS TO MAKE POSITIVE CHOICES IN THEIR OWN LIVES.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED TREATMENT FOR APPROXIMATELY 100 RESIDENTS PER MONTH SUFFERINGFROM SUBSTANCE ABUSE AND CHEMICAL ADDICTIONS THROUGH A LONG TERMRESIDENTIAL PROGRAM.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PROVIDED ON-THE-JOB VOCATIONAL TRAINING TO RESIDENTS IN THE FOLLOWINGFIELDS: ADMINISTRATION & COMPUTER; ACCOUNTING; CLINICAL CARE:MARKETING; INDUCTION; FOOD SERVICES; MEDICAL ADMINISTRATION; ANDCONTRACT SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION ADOPTED THE PROVISIONS OF ASC 740-10-25, ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. UNDER ASC 740-10-25, AN ORGANIZATION MUST RECOGNIZE THE TAX EFFECT OF INCOME TAX POSITIONS ONLY IF THOSE POSITIONS ARE MORE LIKELY THAN NOT OF BEING SUSTAINED. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT BELIEVE THAT THERE ARE ANY MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JUNE 30, 2023. THE ORGANIZATION FILES INCOME TAX RETURNS IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION AND THE STATE OF HAWAII. TAX REGULATIONS WITHIN EACH JURISDICTION ARE SUBJECT TO INTERPRETATION OF THE RELATED TAX LAWS AND REGULATIONS AND REQUIRE SIGNIFICANT JUDGMENT TO APPLY. WITH FEW EXCEPTIONS, THE ORGANIZATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO U.S. FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL, OR NON-U.S. INCOME TAX EXAMINATION BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS PRIOR TO FISCAL YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2020.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: VICTORIA MARINO (DIRECTOR) AND LILA MARINO-CAMACHO (DIRECTOR/SECRETARY) ARE SIBLINGS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS OF THE CORPORATION SHALL BE MEMBERS. ALSO THE RESIDENTS, STAFF TRAINEES, EMPLOYEES AND GRADUATES OF FACILITIES OPERATED BY THE CORPORATION SHALL BE ELIGIBLE FOR MEMBERSHIP AND MAY BE ELECTED TO THE MEMBERSHIP AT THE ANNUAL MEETING OF THE MEMBERS BY A MAJORITY VOTE OF THE MEMBERS PRESENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DRAFT OF THE 990 IS EMAILED TO THE BOARD WHEN RECEIVED, COMMENTS AND QUESTIONS ARE SOLICITED. ONCE THE RESPONSES ARE RECEIVED, AND THE QUESTIONS RESOLVED, THE CONTROLLER NOTIFIES THE TAX PREPARER THAT THE 990 IS READY TO BE FINALIZED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DETAILED QUESTIONNAIRE IS COMPLETED ANNUALLY BY ALL DIRECTORS. IT IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND CONTROLLER FOR ANY CONFLICTS REQUIRING DISCLOSURE. IF THERE ARE ANY, THEY ARE BROUGHT TO THE ATTENTION OF THE BOARD CHAIR FOR RESOLUTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PERFORMANCE REVIEW OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS REVIEWED BY THE ENTIRE BOARD. COMPENSATION IS ALSO DETERMINED BY THE BOARD. TWO OF THE MEMBERS OF THE BOARD ARE LONG TIME EXECUTIVES IN THE NONPROFIT SECTOR, WHILE OTHERS ARE CHIEF EXECUTIVES OF THEIR ORGANIZATIONS. COLLECTIVELY, THEY ASSIGN A PERCENTAGE INCREASE COMMENSURATE WITH THE PERFORMANCE FOR THE YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS FILED WITH THE STATE OF HAWAII ATTORNEY GENERAL'S OFFICE AND IS AVAILABLE ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE AND FILED WITH THE STATE OF HAWAII ATTORNEY GENERAL'S OFFICE.
